mapper.select: SELECT stock_code FROM stock ORDER BY stock_code desc LIMIT 1
SELECT s.*, r.raw_name, r.raw_type FROM stock s LEFT JOIN raw_material r ON s.raw_code = r.raw_code WHERE ${category} LIKE #{content}
